title: Data Scientist
description:
Experience- 5 to 10 years

Location Chennai Only

Who are able to go face to face round in Chennai on 15th February

Responsibilities

Python, SQL, Statistics , Snowflake ,Azure

Proficiency in Python Programming
Data Manipulation skills in Pandas, Numpy
Understanding and application of ML algorithms and libraries like scikit-learn, Tensor flow ,PyTorch
Ability to create meaningful EDA visualization using tools like Matplotlib, seaborn
Strong skills in Statistical concepts
Use strong knowledge in algorithms and predictive models to investigate problems, detect patterns and recommend solutions
Collaborates with business partners to understand their problems and goals, develop predictive modeling, statistical analysis, data reports and performance metrics
Oversee and mentor more junior team members
